name: gullibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the way that shows you are easily deceived or tricked, or too willing to believe everything that people say: I can't believe that they have, gullibly, got themselves into this. Do they really think people will gullibly believe the government's claim that the dam will be finished in two years? Related word
gullible
More examplesFewer examplesThe photo of the giant sea monster that circulated on the internet was fake, but I'm sure a lot of people gullibly believed it to be real. As a kid, I gullibly thought that there was a tiny man singing and talking inside the radio.
